name: Technomancer Tara
description:
There's nothing to watch, mom's still at work, and all her friends are all busy. It seems like yet another boring night when an unexpected text brings her destiny to Tara's fingertips. The Calamity is coming and it's up to Tara to explore her mom's secret lair, collect Friends (tm), and become the Technomancer she is destined to be.

Art and Programming by Lurkin

Music and SFX by Nimmems

Engine: GameMaker Studio 2

This game was created in 2 weeks for the Amaze Me Game Jam

-Controls-

Keyboard and Mouse
